at the beginning of combat on your turn target creature you control gets plus n plus n until end of turn
at the beginning of combat on your turn you may have target creature you control get plus n plus n and gain haste until end of turn if you do sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step
at the beginning of combat on your turn target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn
at the beginning of combat on your turn target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn
